mapper.select: select id, meet_name, to_char(crt_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') crt_time, crt_user, crt_name, crt_host, pname, scop, levels, meet_img, iscross, meet_status, meet_describe, meet_type, meet_resource, begin_time, end_time, org, current_progress, all_progress from zz_meeting where 1=1 and id = #{meetId}
mapper.insert: insert into ZZ_Meeting (id, meet_name, crt_time, crt_user, crt_name, crt_host, pname, scop, levels, meet_img, iscross, meet_status, meet_describe, meet_type, org, begin_time, end_time, all_progress, current_progress ) values ( #{params.id}, #{params.meetName}, sysdate, #{params.crtUser}, #{params.crtName}, #{params.crtHost}, #{params.pname}, #{params.scop}, #{params.levels}, #{params.meetImg}, #{params.iscross}, #{params.meetStatus}, #{params.meetDescribe}, #{params.meetType}, #{params.org,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{params.beginTime}, #{params.endTime}, #{params.allProgress,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{params.currentProgress,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update ZZ_Meeting
meet_name = #{params.meetName},
pname = #{params.pname},
scop = #{params.scop},
levels = #{params.levels},
meet_img = #{params.meetImg},
iscross = #{params.iscross},
meet_status = #{params.meetStatus},
meet_describe = #{params.meetDescribe},
meet_type = #{params.meetType},
org = #{params.org},
begin_time = #{params.beginTime},
end_time = #{params.endTime},
all_progress = #{params.allProgress},
current_progress = #{params.currentProgress},
upd_time = sysdate, upd_user = #{params.updUser}, upd_host = #{params.updHost}, upd_name = #{params.updName}
where id = #{params.id}
mapper.select: select code,name from ZZ_CODE_MEETING_PROGRESS order by code asc
select code,name,meet_function meetfunction from ZZ_CODE_MEETING_ROLE where is_use='1' order by code asc
select code,name from ZZ_CODE_MEETING_FUNCTION where is_use='1' order by code asc
select code, name from zz_code_meeting_function where 1=1 and code in (${codes}) order by code asc

select t.* from zz_meeting t, zz_meeting_user mu , (select max(createtime) lastmsgtime,receiver from zz_message_info ms where type = 'MEET' and cancel = '0' group by receiver) ms2 where mu.meeting_id = t.id and t.id = ms2.receiver(+) and mu.user_id = #{userId} order by nvl(ms2.lastmsgtime,t.crt_time) desc
